name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<f64, N> as core_simd::simd::num::float::SimdFloat>::is_subnormal

core_simd::simd::num::float::SimdFloat::.doc:
Produces a vector where every element has the absolute value of the
 equivalently-indexed element in `self`.

Raw transmutation to an unsigned integer vector type with the
 same size and number of elements.

core_simd::simd::cmp::eq::SimdPartialEq:.doc: Test if each element is not equal to the corresponding element in `other`.
Test if each element is equal to the corresponding element in `other`.
